page.title: 17Sewage Farm.
page.content: When the water comes in to the works its all mercky and green. It then goes through two lots of metal bars collect to the rags and bits of paper.Then the water goes into two big mixing tanks where all the grit and similar little things are removed. When that is over the water goes into a pipe and gets sprayed into a filter pit where it is strained.I then goes into the river. When they clean out the pipe that comes from the filter pit they sometimes find eels about two feet long. There are two people that look after the works and there are about 5 people that go in and out. The deepest tank is thirty-two feet deep.
